name: vs devel remastered - you will die
name_original: vs devel remastered - you will die
description:
hey

have you ever wanted to run from two giant hands, a head the kinda looks like a bull skull, and a weird bullet made of lightning while listening to cartoon sfx 24/7?

well now you can!! and it's free!!

to make a story short, i figured out how to export scratch projects as PROGRAMS you can play on your computer. what does this mean? scratch is now a legit game development software!

original scratch project - export your own scratch projects
